title: 77. The BEST Sourdough Bread and troubleshooting starters with Axe and Root Homestead
description:
Join Angela, from Axe and Root Homestead and me, as we chat all things sourdough! As two experience sourdough bakers, we chat troubleshooting, favorite recipes and the best way to make bread.

Follow along with Angela-

Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/axeandroothomestead/

Axe and Root Homesteading Classes- https://axeandroothomestead.thinkific.com/

Her Cookbook- https://www.axeandroothomestead.com/store/p45/TheHarvestTableCookbook-Autumn.html

Youtube- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEPbqS1gja_dtUWgloO5PLQ

Blog- https://www.axeandroothomestead.com/

The Berkey Holiday Sale- https://www.berkeyfilters.com/collections/berkey-filters-holiday-sale-2020?a_aid=5b2cf1884101a&a_bid=a7480422
dc:creator: Lisa Bass
